reinforcelearn

Reinforcement Learning Environment

Reinforcement Learning Environment

Arguments

step

[function(self, action)] Custom step function.
reset

[function()] Custom reset function.
visualize

[function(self)] Optional custom visualize function.

Usage

Environment$new(step, reset, visualize)

Methods

$new() Initializes a new environment. $reset() Starts a new episode. Returns the state. $step(action) Take action in environment. Returns a list with state, reward, done. $visualize() Visualizes environment.

Examples

step = function(self, action) {
  state = list(mean = action + rnorm(1), sd = runif(1))
  reward = rnorm(1, state[[1]], state[[2]])
  done = FALSE
  list(state, reward, done)
}

reset = function() {
  state = list(mean = 0, sd = 1)
  state
}

env = Environment$new(step, reset)
env$reset()
#> $mean
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $sd
#> [1] 1
#> 
env$step(100)
#> $state
#> $state$mean
#> [1] 98.59996
#> 
#> $state$sd
#> [1] 0.6007609
#> 
#> 
#> $reward
#> [1] 97.99559
#> 
#> $done
#> [1] FALSE
#>
